New Records: The Raptors suffered their largest margin of loss in a season opener, with a 30-point defeat, surpassing the previous record of 29 points set in 2001.
Key Match Events: The Cavaliers took control early in the second quarter, leading to a 69-49 halftime deficit and never looking back.
Post-Match Reflections: Raptors head coach Darko Rajakovic expressed pride in the team's effort and highlighted the opportunity for four rookies to make their NBA debuts.
Miscellaneous Highlights: A sold-out crowd of 19,800 fans, including former Raptors players and Hall of Famer Vince Carter, attended the game.
